Hello all! As you can guess, the new council has discussed about a 
few things. We will soon get to clear out the member list, but to 
make up for the reduced number of member, we'd like everyone to ask 
friends to join. As I like to say, the more, the merrier! Also, we 
talked about this:

- There will be a fourth faction that will come in the game. The 
members will decide among suggested concepts and ultimately, one 
faction will be brought into play. The concept had to include the 
alliegeance (if to any other group), the goals, the typical attitude 
and the general functions of the typical members. Also, such concepts 
will be made for the four major factions and the minor ones.

- As it was hinted previously, the council might start designing plot 
lines that will require active participation from the members. These 
plotlines would be designed to keep the players on the edge and be 
ready for anything... However, we will need your accord for that. 
What do you think of it?

Since we don't have a ready message board on the website, we'll allow 
people to speak their mind on this board. For the faction 
suggestions, though, create a separate post, please.
